resources.string:
Take a picture of the 
Brand or Company Logo 
of the Product or Service 
you wish to rate today.

SpotReview is the go-to app for 
 consumers who wish to rate products or 
 services on the fly! 

 From having an aweful customer 
 experience at your local restaurant, to 
 complimenting your baker on the most 
 beautiful and delicious cake you've ever 
 tasted, SpotReview is there for you to 
 capture and share your experiences in 
 real-time, as they happen. 

 What we do, is share this information with 
 companies, so that they can understand 
 what you're saying about them in terms 
 of the products and/or services you've 
 bought from them. 

 As the saying goes, "there's no better 
 time than the present", so remember, if 
 you're paying for it and have something 
 to say about it, GOOD or BAD. 

 Tell the world! With SpotReview.

We aim to make the world a 
 better place for YOU\, the 
 Customer. 

 So remember\, if you paid for 
 it and have something to say 
 Good and Bad 

 Tell the world with 
 SpotReview
